summary: A minimal alternate character creation system.
descriptionHtml:
Alternate Character System

Updated to reflect the 1.3 changes.

I created this mod because all vanilla characters start out with the same attributes and only have a handful of skills that are different between the races. I wanted different characters to feel more unique from the start, without changing the vanilla system too much. The character must be level 1 for this system to apply to them. This mod changes the following:

Note: Adjustable ranges are shown as following: [default, min-max]

- The starting level for all skills is [0, 0-15].
- The standard race bonus will be applied to the appropriate skills, just like vanilla.
- Choose a focus (Combat, Stealth or Magic). If a focus is chosen all skills in the focus will receive +[5, 0-15] to their starting level. The following adjustments will also be applied:

Combat: Carry Weight +50
Stealth: Carry Weight +25
Magic: Halcyon Mind [+50% magicka regen when not wearing armor]

- Choose up to 6 primary skills. Every primary skill chosen will receive +[10, 0-15] to their starting level.
- Choose up to 6 secondary skills. Every secondary skill chosen will receive +[5, 0-15] to their starting level.
- The following adjustments will be made for each primary skill selected. Secondary skill selections will receive half of the values specified below.
[list]
[*]Archery: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Block: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Heavy Armor: Health +8, Magicka -8
[*]One-Handed: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Smithing: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Two-Handed: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Alchemy: Health +4, Magicka +4, Stamina -8
[*]Light Armor: Health +8, Magicka -8
[*]Lockpicking: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Pickpocket: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Sneak: Health -8, Stamina +8
[*]Speechcraft: Health -8, Magicka +4, Stamina +4
[*]Alteration: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Conjuration: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Destruction: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Enchanting: Health -8, Magicka +4, Stamina +4
[*]Illusion: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Restoration: Health +4, Magicka +4, Stamina -8
[/list]
- All choices made to this point will determine starting attributes. If all options were skipped vanilla rules will apply, but your starting skill level will still be [0, 0-15]. Otherwise, the following will be applied to the attribute adjustments according to what classification the character race falls in (vanilla races only). For example combat races get a reduced penalty and a bigger bonus for health adjustments.

Combat: Imperial, Nord, Orc and Redguard
[list]
[*]Health: (-adj) * 90%, (+adj) * 110%
[*]Magicka: (-adj) * 120%, (+adj) * 80%
[*]Stamina: (-adj) * 90%, (+adj) * 110%
[/list]
Stealth: Argonian, Dark Elf, Khajiit and Wood Elf
[list]
[*]No modification of adjustments
[/list]
Magic: Breton and High Elf
[list]
[*]Health: (-adj) * 110%, (+adj) * 90%
[*]Magicka: (-adj) * 80%, (+adj) * 120%
[*]Stamina: (-adj) * 110%, (+adj) * 90%
[/list]
- The carry weight adjustment is derived as follows: carry weight adjustment + (stamina adjustment / 2).
- The starting attributes can now be modified at this point.
- Choose a starting standing stone (or none)
- Enable all attributes increasing at level up. If this option is enabled all attributes will increase at level up.
[list]
[*]1st chosen attribute: +[5, 0-10]
[*]2nd chosen attribute: +[3, 0-10]
[*]Last attribute: +[2, 0-10]
[/list]
- Enable auto perks. If this option is enabled certain perks will be granted once the associated skill has reached the appropriate level. Each skill has 5 auto perks. The skill level at which auto perks start can also be adjusted, [10, 0-15]

Combat
[list]
[*]Archery [Overdraw 1-5]
[*]Block [Shield Wall 1-5]
[*]HeavyArmor [Juggernaut 1-5]
[*]OneHanded [Armsman 1-5]
[*]Smithing [Steel Smithing, Dwarven Smithing, Elven Smithing, Orcish Smithing, Advanced Armors]
[*]TwoHanded [Barbarian 1-5]
[/list]
Stealth
[list]
[*]Alchemy [Alchemist 1-5]
[*]LightArmor [Agile Defender 1-5]
[*]Lockpicking [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Pickpocket [Light Fingers 1-5]
[*]Sneak [Stealth 1-5]
[*]Speechcraft [Haggling 1-5]
[/list]
Magic
[list]
[*]Alteration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Conjuration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Destruction [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Enchanting [Enchanter 1-5]
[*]Illusion [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Restoration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[/list]
- Additional perk points can also be enabled. This allows the character to gain an additional perk point every [5, 1-20] levels.

- MCM menu has been added. This requires SKSE and SKYUI.


Installation:
Extract the mod into your skyrim data folder and enable it.


Upgrade Note:
When upgrading from 1.0 you will get extra attribute level up messages the first level up after upgrade. Skip all messages with all three attributes showing.


Compatibility:
This mod should be compatible with alternate start mods and race menus. This mod's configuration menus will pop up the first chance they get, ie when you first get full control of your character or after the vanilla character creation. This mod is not compatible with other character creation mods like CCO. I would imagine last one wins. This mod is modular in design, all aspects can be skipped or turned off, so if an aspect is incompatible skip or disable it. A mod that changes the function of a perk should be fine. I use Better Magic and it changes a lot of the magic perks with out issue. The problem will come when a perk is removed or hidden. If a mod alters the attributes gained at level up, it may be incompatible. Most likely it will have a cumulative effect on the attribute increases.


License:
The source of this mod is also available. You can do whatever you want with it, just don't blame me if things go wrong. Basically the MIT license.


Credits:
syclonix - for the Character Creation Overhaul mod that inspired this mod. He generously provided the source for his mod to the community for personal use. I used it and the many tutorials on the web to learn how to get things done with scripts. This mod is an original work by me that was influenced by CCO.

Character Creation Overhaul:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21587/?
author: Talonas

files.name: AlternateCharacterSystem_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
Change Log:
v1.1
Attribute adjustment for focus has changed
Combat
[list]
[*]Health: +0
[*]Magicka: -60
[*]Stamina: +0
[*]Carry Weight: +100
[/list]
Stealth
[list]
[*]Health: -10
[*]Magicka: -40
[*]Stamina: -10
[*]Carry Weight: +50
[/list]
Magic
[list]
[*]Health: -40
[*]Magicka: +20
[*]Stamina: -40
[*]Carry Weight: 0
[*]Halcyon Mind: +50% magicka regen when not wearing armor
[/list]
- Add messages to configure skill points gained on focus, primary, secondary and all starting skill levels
- Add message to configure attr gain at level up
- Added new additional perk option
- Add message to configure additional perk option
- Add MCM with auto perk and all attributes gained at level up
. option to get a perk point every 1 to 10 level(s)
. option to reset and redo character - must be level 1
- When the reset option is selected or auto perks are re-enabled please wait for the MCM to update
. reset - a message will show after the reset
. auto perks - the check will show after the skills are updated

files.name: AlternateCharacterSystem_1_2
files.changelogHtml:
- Added the ability to configure when auto perks start. Default is skill level 10, value range [0-15]. The voices in my head finally won. It hasn't sat well with me that a skill at level 0 had a perk. This fixes that. The downside is that if you spend a perk point for an auto perk before the start level, you basically lose that auto perk.

- Attribute adjustments for focus, primary and secondary skills has changed. The description contains the revised details.

files.name: Source_1_2
files.changelogHtml:
- Added the ability to configure when auto perks start. Default is skill level 10, value range [0-15]. The voices in my head finally won. It hasn't sat well with me that a skill at level 0 had a perk. This fixes that. The downside is that if you spend a perk point for an auto perk before the start level, you basically lose that auto perk.

- Attribute adjustments for focus, primary and secondary skills has changed. The description contains the revised details.

files.name: AlternateCharacterSystem_1_2_1
files.changelogHtml:
-Fixed some minor issues with MCM
range of attributes was wrong [1-20], changed to [0-10]
perk per level value was not showing quantifier once changed

-Balance changes
all attributes go up at level up - default attribute allocation was 8,4,2 now 5,3,2

removed 'all smithing' and combo perk options
auto perks give 5 perks, down from 6 - removed the one misc perk

Combat
[list]
[*]Archery [Overdraw 1-5]
[*]Block [Shield Wall 1-5]
[*]HeavyArmor [Juggernaut 1-5]
[*]OneHanded [Armsman 1-5]
[*]Smithing [Heavy or Light - depending on you choice at character creation]
[*]TwoHanded [Barbarian 1-5]
[/list]
Stealth
[list]
[*]Alchemy [Alchemist 1-5]
[*]LightArmor [Agile Defender 1-5]
[*]Lockpicking [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Pickpocket [Light Fingers 1-5]
[*]Sneak [Stealth 1-5]
[*]Speechcraft [Haggling 1-5]
[/list]
Magic
[list]
[*]Alteration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Conjuration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Destruction [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Enchanting [Enchanter 1-5]
[*]Illusion [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[*]Restoration [Novice, Apprentice, Adept, Expert, Master]
[/list]

skill adjustment range was [0-20], now [0-15]
I have balanced the starting attributes, they will be very close to the combined vanilla 300 points.

Combat
[list]
[*]Health: 0
[*]Magicka: 0
[*]Stamina: 0
[*]Carry Weight: +50
[/list]
Stealth
[list]
[*]Health: 0
[*]Magicka: 0
[*]Stamina: 0
[*]Carry Weight: +25
[/list]
Magic
[list]
[*]Health: 0
[*]Magicka: 0
[*]Stamina: 0
[*]Carry Weight: 0
[*]Halcyon Mind: +50% magicka regen when not wearing armor
[/list]

Primary and secondary attribute adjustments have changed to have a net adjustment of 0. Secondary is half the values listed below.

[list]
[*]Archery: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Block: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Heavy Armor: Health +8, Magicka -8
[*]One-Handed: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Smithing: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Two-Handed: Magicka -8, Stamina +8
[*]Alchemy: Health +4, Magicka +4, Stamina -8
[*]Light Armor: Health +8, Magicka -8
[*]Lockpicking: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Pickpocket: Health +4, Magicka -8, Stamina +4
[*]Sneak: Health -8, Stamina +8
[*]Speechcraft: Health -8, Magicka +4, Stamina +4
[*]Alteration: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Conjuration: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Destruction: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Enchanting: Health -8, Magicka +4, Stamina +4
[*]Illusion: Health -4, Magicka +8, Stamina -4
[*]Restoration: Health +4, Magicka +4, Stamina -8
[/list]

files.name: AlternateCharacterSystem_1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Version 1.3

-Updated the character creation messages - they are now more consistent and hopefully more helpful

-Added the ability to modify the starting attributes after the secondary skill selection

-Auto perks - smithing now only gives the following perks: Steel Smithing, Dwarven Smithing, Elven Smithing, Orcish Smithing, Advanced Armors

files.name: Source_1_3
files.changelogHtml:
